/sw/eb/sw/CUDA/9.2.88/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/bitonic.dir/bitonic.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/bitonic.dir/cmake_device_link.o -Xnvlink /scratch/group/csce435-f23/Caliper/caliper/lib64/libcaliper.so.2.11.0-dev -Xlinker --enable-new-dtags -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /sw/eb/sw/impi/2019.9.304-iccifort-2020.4.304/intel64/lib/release -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /sw/eb/sw/impi/2019.9.304-iccifort-2020.4.304/intel64/lib -Xlinker --enable-new-dtags -Xnvlink /sw/eb/sw/impi/2019.9.304-iccifort-2020.4.304/intel64/lib/libmpicxx.so -Xnvlink /sw/eb/sw/impi/2019.9.304-iccifort-2020.4.304/intel64/lib/release/libmpi.so -Xnvlink /lib64/librt.so -lpthread -Xnvlink /lib64/libdl.so
